name: Baker's Vault
tag_list: food, baked-goods, bakery, cakes, cookies, candy, marketplace, baking, recipes, social-network, housewives
description: online marketplace for baked good lovers
overview:
Baker’s Vault is a new online marketplace where lovers of baked goods come together to share in their love of baking. This site provides an easy access to a dedicated community of bakers and baked good lovers. Persons interested in becoming bakers simply have to sign up and customize their own bakery shops and wait for customers to come to them. The process is easy and FREE. Baker’s Vault only gets paid when their customers get paid.

It provides a venue where people can buy and sell homemade baked products from people around the world. We all remember baked goodies the way granny used to make and Baker’s Vault provides the opportunity to experience grandma’s goodies time and time again. The bakers and members can be your next door neighbors, local bakeries and people wanting to make extra money doing something that they love, BAKING!!!

Baker’s Vault is a social networking site for baking. Their motto is bake, sell and make friends doing what you love!
